TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents the section in the configuration file that addresses the role class. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
This class derives from <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> which represents a section in a configuration file when implemented in a derived class. More information may be obtained by reference to this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets the names of the direct reports.
Docs.value: The names of the direct reports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DirectReports is a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty> defined for this type with default value "`DirectReports`". This type represents a configuration property, attribute, or child element that is contained in an element of a configuration file.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the distinguished name for this instance.
Docs.value: The distinguished name for this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DistinguishedName is a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty> defined for this type with default value "`DistiguishedName`". This type represents a configuration property, attribute, or child element that is contained in an element of a configuration file.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the group for this instance.
Docs.value: The name of the group for this instance.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the manager associated with this instance.
Docs.value: The name of the manager associated with this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Manager is a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty> defined for this type with default value "`Manager`". This type represents a configuration property, attribute, or child element that is contained in an element of a configuration file.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the member for this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Member is a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty> defined for this type with default value "`Member`". This type represents a configuration property, attribute, or child element that is contained in an element of a configuration file.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the root path for this instance.
Docs.value: The root path for this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks RootPath is a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty> defined for this type with default value "`RootPath` ". This type represents a configuration property, attribute, or child element that is contained in an element of a configuration file.
